docs.title: Systems Engineering Notes
docs.text:
A Structured Self-Training Program in UAV Systems Engineering

This site documents a progressive study journey through practical systems engineering concepts, using an expendable UAV as the reference system.

The goal is not deep specialization in subsystems, but understanding how subsystems connect, interact, and integrate into a coherent system.

The study progresses from:

  • System overview and mission context
  • Subsystem fundamentals (airframe, propulsion, avionics, power, communication)
  • System architecture thinking
  • Requirement writing (SRS)
  • Interface definition (IDS)
  • Integration of all artifacts into a coherent system package

This is not a theoretical handbook.

It is a structured thinking exercise in systems engineering.
